item.title: Command help (FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

first off, it says playerRights < 2 (no using the client constructor, so this variable is set somewhere in the class?)

even if this was right per player object, it would be appended towards moderators and normal players (LESS THAN 2)

generally, in project insanity; the commands are split depending on rights; so you’ll probably have a few commands for the same purpose

Read full topic

item.title: Command help (FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

I am trying to make a ::bank command for Admins + Owners so when they do ::bank it will open there bank and they can takeout the items they want.

I have tried this

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank") && (playerRights < 2)) { c.getPA().openBankUp(); }

The account logged into the server has owner rights but I tried the code with the playerRights being 2 because I thought it would work for upper playerRights but it didn’t work so I changed the playerRights to 3 and then tried it and it worked. How can I make it so that it will work for both Admin + Owner?

Read full topic
